analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/43/0x9b7922f5c51b43b59ea666ed77191c4cdbfca72f.sol:
	Contract VCPcoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/43/0x9b7922f5c51b43b59ea666ed77191c4cdbfca72f.sol#182-183)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/43/0x9b7922f5c51b43b59ea666ed77191c4cdbfca72f.sol#66-68) is not in mixedCase
